raw.remarks: Welcome to the charming gated lakeside community of Clearwood. This 2-story,3 bed 2.5 bathroom is the perfect starter home. Located in a quaint cul-de-sac it boasts laminate floors and new carpets throughout. Open oak cabinetry- kitchen w/tile counters. Featuring  ceiling fans, walk-in closets, pellet stove, French doors, wooden covered deck, 12x10 Shed, RV Parking  Custom leaf guard gutters AND a  hot tub that stays with the home. Enjoy community lifestyle w/3 lakes, pool & more! Close to JBLM!

mergeVariables.name: frontCtaContent
mergeVariables.value: Get the scoop on what your neighbor's home sold for!

mergeVariables.name: backContent
mergeVariables.value: We all like to know what our neighbor's home sold for. A higher sales price could mean getting more equity out of your home too.

raw.remarks: Enchanting 1939 home with all the charm of yesteryear! Enjoy original millwork & light fixtures, original HW floors, and open living spaces with oversized windows. Home is drenched in light! New roof 2014, new fence 2019. Kitchen with eating space plus huge mud room for storage. 2 bdrms & 1 bath downstairs + 2 bdrms, 1/2 bath & loft upstairs. Level lot with fenced yard has alley access; garage w/ shop space. Walk to Starbucks, grocery, schools, Tolt-MacDonald Park. Pre-inspected, 1-yr warranty.

raw.remarks: Check out this well maintained one owner home. Features include open concept living, good sized kitchen with ample counter space as well as an island and newer appliances, split floor bedroom plan with full bathroom in the master and walk in closet. Home has newer hot water heater plus large laundry room. Outside there are 2 sheds, 1 with power. Quality and affordability. Go Show!
